thread.title_full: Dharmendra's brother and Abhay Deol's father Ajit Singh Deol no more - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Dharmendra's brother and Abhay Deol's father Ajit Singh Deol no more
text:
Bollywood actor Abhay Deol 's father and industry legend Dharmendra's younger brother Ajit Singh Deol passed away in Mumbai on Friday.
*Ajit Singh Deol. Pic/YouTube*
Ajit, who was ailing since past one month and was reportedly under treatment of gall bladder complications, breathed his last on Friday evening around 6.30 pm, ... Â»
